New Records: Quinton de Kock scored the highest individual score of the tournament with 174 runs
Key Match Events: South Africa scored 382 for 5, Bangladesh scored 233 and lost by 149 runs
Mahmudullah scored an unbeaten 111 off 100 balls for Bangladesh
Marco Jansen took two wickets in two balls for South Africa
Miscellaneous Highlights: Quinton de Kock announced he would quit one-day internationals after the World Cup
Others: The match was played at the Wankhede Stadium in Mumbai
